Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Doing a Predoctoral Research Stay but You Were Afraid to Ask
The timeline strikes back
24
Recommended steps:
1.
Check Bureaucracy
-
Conditions on dates (day
before/after)*
-
Condition on travel expenses.
-
Conditions on justification of 
lodgment.
2.
Lodgment
3.
Travel (sometimes required for
getting the first transfer)
4.
Culture/Language
5.
Enjoy!
6.
Come back with all the paperwork
you need .
I WILL SUCCED!
* Advice sponsored by
Your lifetime temporal friend
speaker: SYSTEM
